alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Wisconsin Dells, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Portage and Interstate 90/94 Interchange. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 102 and 108. Interstate 39 between mile markers 85 and 95. Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 109 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
